    • Method Detail

      • getLowerPrime

        public static int getLowerPrime(int number,
                                int min)
        Return a prime lower than the given value and higher than the minimum value.
        Parameters:
        number - the number to find the closest prime for
        min - the minimum boundary
        Returns:
        Return a prime lower than the given value and higher than the minimum value.

      • getRandomPrime

        public static long getRandomPrime()
        Return a random prime number in the given range.
        Returns:
        Return a random prime number in the given range the current maximum number is 2^31 to speed up this process, but this can be changed.

      • isPrime

        public static boolean isPrime(long number)
        Check whether the given number is a prime number.
        Parameters:
        number - the number to check
        Returns:
        Return true when the given number is a prime number. Return false otherwise.

      • getRandomLongBetweenRange

        public static long getRandomLongBetweenRange(long min,
                                             long max)
        Return a random long number in the given range.
        Parameters:
        min - the minimum value
        max - the maximum value
        Precondition:
        Range is smaller than the maximum long value.
            max-min <= Long.MAX_VALUE
        Returns:
        Return a random long number in the given range (between min and max-1).
            Math.abs((randomNumberGenerator.nextLong() % (max - min))) + min

      • getRandomLong

        public static long getRandomLong()

      • getRandomIntBetweenRange

        public static int getRandomIntBetweenRange(int min,
                                           int max)
        Return a random integer in the given range.
        Parameters:
        min - the minimum value
        max - the maximum value
        Returns:
        Return a random integer number in the given range (between min and max).
            result == (new Random()).nextInt(max-min) + min;

      • clamp

        public static int clamp(int value,
                        int min,
                        int max)
        Return the value clamped between the min and max.
        Parameters:
        value - the value to clamp
        min - the minimum value
        max - the maximum value
        Returns:
        Return the minimum value when value is smaller than min, the maximum value when value is higher than max and value otherwise.

      • generateRandomIntegerSequence

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> generateRandomIntegerSequence(int sequenceLength,
                                                                                   int maxNumber)
        Generate a random sequence of integers.
        Parameters:
        sequenceLength - the length of the random sequence
        maxNumber - the maximum number that can be in this sequence
        Returns:
        Generate a random sequence of unique integers where each number lays between 0 and maxNumber-1.
